title: The Serene Adventures of Mallory Carter
summary: Over the course of a week, Mallory Carter, a 66-year-old composer and gardener, discovers her supernatural abilities to control nature and sound, using them to thwart a local threat and bring peace to her community.
summaryGerman: Im Laufe einer Woche entdeckt Mallory Carter, eine 66-jährige Komponistin und Gärtnerin, ihre übernatürlichen Fähigkeiten, Natur und Klang zu kontrollieren, indem sie damit eine lokale Bedrohung abwehrt und Frieden in ihre Gemeinschaft bringt.
summaryDutch: Gedurende een week ontdekt Mallory Carter, een 66-jarige componiste en tuinierster, haar bovennatuurlijke vermogens om de natuur en geluid te beheersen, waarmee ze een lokale dreiging afwendt en vrede brengt in haar gemeenschap.
summaryFrench: Au cours d'une semaine, Mallory Carter, une compositrice et jardinière de 66 ans, découvre ses capacités surnaturelles à contrôler la nature et le son, les utilisant pour contrer une menace locale et apporter la paix à sa communauté.

story.text: Mallory Carter spent her morning gardening, humming melodies that seemed to make her plants sway gently in rhythm.
While working in her garden at dusk, Mallory felt a strange sensation and noticed the wind carrying her tunes beyond natural reach, affecting the very weather patterns.
Mallory, intrigued by her newfound powers, experimented with creating music that could accelerate the growth of her plants.
Under the full moon, she played a haunting melody that attracted a myriad of nighttime creatures, creating a symphony of wildlife in her backyard.
Distressed by her uncontrolled influence on nature, Mallory feared the repercussions, but a visit from a wise old friend gave her comfort and guidance.
Using her abilities, Mallory stopped a local developer from cutting down a cherished forest, orchestrating a concert that swayed the community and even the developer’s heart.
Mallory held a garden concert for her neighborhood, showcasing her ability to meld nature and music into one harmonious experience, winning everyone's admiration.

moral: Embrace your unique talents; they can be a powerful force for good in your community.
ending: And so, Mallory continued to create beautiful harmonies, her garden and her music always a sanctuary for all.
